PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-04052020-05-30TC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActAeronautics Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian Aviation Regulations (Lasers)
PrecisRegulations amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (LASERS) in order to address the danger to aviation safety caused by laser attacks on aircraft by prohibiting the possession of hand-held lasers in the vicinity of airports, heliports and concerned municipal regions.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0124 Publication Date: 2020-06-10
AttachmentsAttachment
